title: New: Naomi Scott – Lover’s Lies
content:
Anthemic pop vibes from London’s Naomi Scott on her new track, Lover’s Lies, lifted from a forthcoming EP titled Promises.

Also known for her acting in recent blockbuster The Martian, alongside appearances in Terra Nova (which, FYI, ended too soon) and The 33, Scott’s vocal delivery is considered and deeply affecting. Check out Lover’s Lies below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
